Posts.Content: @Pelican: I've been on Xeloda since May, so not too long...
Posts.Title: Oral Drugs That Have Worked

Posts.Content: Hi, Diagnosed as stage 4, metastatic triple negative and is currently taking Xeloda.  Would love to hear from others who have had good success with other oral drugs as we would prefer this to traditional chemotherapy. Thanks so much!
Posts.Title: Oral Drugs That Have Worked
